 * dec.cpp

 *      Author: Anoosh
 */


#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

int main() {

	char string[100000];

	memset(string, 0, 100000);

	cin >> string;

	for(long int i = 0; string[i] ; i++) {

		string[i] += 3;
	}

	cout << string << endl;

	return 0;
}
